Document.Focus: When you are drinking too much - tips for cutting back

Synonyms.Synonym: Alcohol use disorder - drinking too much

QAPair.Question: What is (are) When you are drinking too much - tips for cutting back ?
QAPair.Answer: Health care providers consider you to be drinking more than is medically safe when you: Are a healthy man up to age 65 and drink: 5 or more drinks on one occasion monthly, or even weekly, More than 14 drinks in a week, Are a healthy woman of all ages or a healthy man over age 65 and drink: 4 or more drinks on one occasion monthly, or even weekly, More than 7 drinks in a week,
